messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/22/2001 5:18:16 AM !!!First Boot!!!, ... You have hit us on a bad run of posts.  Sometimes the list gets away from the she said-she said
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/22/2001 5:18:16 AM !!!First Boot!!!,
carnegie@... writes:


> Is that list always so aggressive/sarcastic/antagonistic??? Or is there
> actually some good information shared once and awhile? Perhaps I am just
> spoiled with being on hs-ca!!! LOL
>


You have hit us on a bad run of posts. Sometimes the list gets away from the
she said-she said garbage and the snottiness long enough to post helpful
things. But, I have to admit, this list does got thru periodic runs of these
posts -- this is the 3rd or 4th time I have seen it in the year (?) I have
been here.

I know your post was private but there you go.

Nance


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
